entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Nipigon

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
